```
Vagrant ssh core-01
docker pull sysdig/sysdig
docker run -i -t --name sysdig --privileged -v /var/run/docker.sock:/host/var/run/docker.sock -v /dev:/host/dev -v /proc:/host/proc:ro -v /boot:/host/boot:ro -v /lib/modules:/host/lib/modules:ro -v /usr:/host/usr:ro sysdig/sysdig

```

/usr/bin/docker run â€“d --name busybox busybox /bin/sh -c "while true; do echo Hello World; sleep 60; done"

```
sysdig -c lscontainers
container.type container.image container.name      container.id
-------------- --------------- ------------------- ------------
docker         busybox         busybox             f74777abf37c
docker         sysdig/sysdig   sysdig              d2da79a0668f
```

```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: backend-app
  labels:
    app: backend-app
    version: v1
    role=backend
spec:
  containers:
  - name: javaapp
    image: kingston/javaapp
    ports:
    - containerPort: 443
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /volumes/logs
      name: logs
  - name: logapp
    image: kingston/logapp:v1.1.3
    ports:
    - containerPort: 9999
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /logs
      name: logs
  - name: monitor
    image: kingston/monitor:v1.5.6
    ports:
    - containerPort: 1234
```
